entries.title: Adobe's CEO Sizes Up the State of Tech Now
entries.description: Shantanu Narayen, who has headed the software company for 15 years, discusses volatility in the industry, the purchase of Figma and setting priorities.

entries.title: All the Cool, Crazy and Cute Tech We Found at CES 2023
entries.description: The megashow featured flying ATVs, diaper-checking baby monitors, autonomous lawn mowers and more.

entries.title: Tech Industry Reversal Intensifies With New Layoffs
entries.description: Technology companies that grew rapidly during the pandemic are now reducing spending and staffing, sometimes more than once.
